content.html: This is …. this is not free speech. By definition this means an authoritarian state has free speech by virtue of having laws, no matter how oppressive. (Putting aside that he’s proposing a speech policy for 200+ different countries in which Twitter operates)
content.value:
This is …. this is not free speech. By definition this means an authoritarian state has free speech by virtue of having laws, no matter how oppressive.

(Putting aside that he’s proposing a speech policy for 200+ different countries in which Twitter operates)
